name: FlowerBomber
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 42 - made in 72 hours

A turn-based game where you collect flower and use bombs to create your path through angry walls and .. water !

Your score improve with your flower collection and by taking portals to other levels. But the more portals you take, the harder it gets !

Controls

Arrow keys to move
f : to use portals
b: to use bombs
o: to suicide
